Terms and Conditions

Because I have to cover my ass

Seeing as the only data you could possibly provide is your name and email when leaving a comment, I hereby swear under oath to the almighty spaghetti monster to only sell this personal data to said monster upon the termination of the universe, thus planned for 2073ce. Until that date I will protect your name and email like it is my own flesh and blood, locking it away in the vault I've dug 100 feet under my house and outfitted with enough security equipment that even Danny Ocean wouldn't think of attempting to breech it.
